idea:
Firescore Interactive is a game development studio, focussed on creating casual mobile games for western markets. 


The studio boasts of over 50 Million downloads till date and has had successes like Soap Cutting, which was the no.1 App in USA, Canada, Australia, etc. (over 20 countries) during Christmas Period of 2019. Another success the studio has had recently is Acrylic Nails, which is the currently the no.2 game in the US, Canada, and over 20 countries on the App Store. 


Firescore is closely associated with Crazy Labs (Israel based top 10 hypercasual gaming company). Crazy Labs are the marketing partners for games developed by Firescore.


Firescore in partnership with Crazy Labs is also running an initiative called Crazy Hubs India, with an aim to mentor and train Indian game development studios. The goal of this programme is to eventually help Indian game development studios produce worldwide super-hit game titles.
name: FIRESCORE INTERACTIVE PRIVATE LIMITED
